reference.title: Create Key Pair dialog
reference.shortdesc: Contains fields for each of the components of a distinguished name (DN) that identifies you as the person generating the key pair.

section.p: This dialog is displayed when you click (Create Key Pair) in the Application Signing Tool view.
You must supply a value for each of the form's fields in order to generate the public-private key pair.

strow.stentry: A unique name to be given to this key pair. Certificates and key pairs are identified by alias within the Application Signing Tool.
The name of the company you are working for.
The company branch or division you are working for.
The full name of your city or locality. For instance, "New York".
Your state or province. This should be a full name. For instance, "California".
Select your country from the list.
